name: The Classic Lace Bridal Gown
brief_summary: Timeless A-line gown with intricate French lace detailing and long sleeves.

brief_summary: Sleek and contemporary sheath dress with a clean neckline and no embellishments.

name: Crystal Embellished Veil
brief_summary: A magnificent cathedral length veil adorned with sparkling crystals along the edge.
